豥豥豥

豥字的基本解释

豥
gāi
四蹄皆白的猪。

豥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gāi］
［《廣韻》户來切，平咍，匣。］
［《廣韻》古哀切，平咍，見。］
特指四蹄都是白色的猪。

豥字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豕字部】　豥； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1196第14
【廣韻】戸來切【集韻】何開切，?音孩。【爾雅·釋獸】豕四蹢皆白，豥。【註】蹢，蹄也。　又【廣韻】古哀切【集韻】柯開切，?音該。又【集韻】魚開切，音皚。又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?下楷切，音駭。義?同。○按《爾雅》郉疏，《詩》白蹢鄭箋，以豥爲駭。駭者，躁疾之言也。駭與豥字異義同。楊愼《字說》豥同駭，《毛氏韻》《正韻》豥亦作駭，?非。

豥字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
豥字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Tofu
gāi
A pig with all white hooves.
Tofu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gāi］
["Guangyun" household cuts, flat 咍, box. ]
["Guangyun" ancient mourning, ping 咍, see you. ]
Especially refers to a pig whose all four hoofs are white.
Tofu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Wu Character Department] 　豥; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1196 No. 14
[Guang Yun] You come to cut [Ji Yun] How to cut,? Yin Hai. 【Erya·Shi Beast】The four hogs are all white, and they are all white. [Note] Swap, hoof also.　[Guang Yun] Ancient Lament Cut [Ji Yun] Ke Kai cut, the sound should be. [Jiyun] The fish is cut open and the sound is white. Also 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】【Zheng Yun】? The next regular cut, the sound is horrible. Righteous? Same. ○According to "Er Ya" Xun Shu, "Poetry" Bai Qiao Zheng Jian, using Xie as a horror. The horror, the words of irritability. The word hack has the same meaning as the word 豥. Yang Yan's "Words" has the same horror, and the "Mao Shi Yun" and "Zheng Yun" have the same horror, right?
